participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for a generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.background: i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry. i try various coffees as a hobby. i'm a huge star wars fan.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
